Scripts¶

rcb-rsnapshot.sh¶

[rcb-rsnapshot.sh]

> /root/bin/rcb-rsnapshot.sh
rcb-rsnapshot.sh [-h|--help] [-i|--increment=[hourly,daily,weekly,monthly]] -- rsnapshot backup
where:
    -h --help show this help text
    -i --increment is one of the options: hourly,daily,weekly or monthly
